text: if this feature was just released publicly, frankly I think it’s too soon. as far as I’m aware the ability to detect user set widths/heights and the ability to set a min and max are not currently in Custom Modules - and that is critical to the success of this feature.
Hm, D&D areas is definitely not fully released. I believe we have been slowly letting customers into a beta (continuously over the past few months), but I’m not 100% familiar with the details
Yes, someone has to specifically request access to the feature in order for it to show up in their portal. (It may have been requested by another user in Stephanie’s portal).
guessing that’s the case. I think that’s the right way to go for testing something this big
